description.title: Events: ethers client using contract.on, with two concurrent filters
description.purpose:
Another approach to subscribe for emitted events using the contract instance on method, where a filter is supplied and a callback function where the event parameters are returned. In this case two filters are used to filter on a key and value respectively from the KeyStorage contract.
Skipped as a breaking change in ethers is messing up the test - will re-enable when fixed.
